title: How many manuscripts and book proposals do major publishers receive every month? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thousands. One particular and popular science fiction magazine gets about 1500 submissions per month. It isn’t too difficult to extrapolate what the major publishing houses receive each month. This is why publishers do not accept direct submissions of manuscripts. They only accept manuscripts from literary agents. Preferably, from literary agents with a proven track record.
The big boys have dozens of acquisitions editors. And each of them gets hundreds of submissions each month.
